news: Welcome to our new feature! Stay tuned for regular updates and exciting news about our radio community.

header: New Release Software & Database (please update software)
news: You can update the database(s) inside the app. If a new Software version is released update the app for latest stuff. Download the latest version: android -> https://api.einstein.amsterdam/webapp/com.einstein.dmr-database-app.apk and for mac -> https://api.einstein.amsterdam/webapp/dmr-app-dmg.zip
Show picture from qrz (if present) on detail view (work in progress, testpage works but backbutton is broken)
A Special thank you to all the testers, we are getting there :)
Lazy Search, search for callsign show all entrys from all databases viaversa by PH4T

header: Search with * not possible yet use % instead
news: instead of * use % f.e. %2emc or just % to search all use it as if it was a *, will fix in software to change * to %
If a Photo is found before looking at Photohunt Page it will not be counted *visit Photohunt page in contacts before hunting* you can also reset the counter there
